title: Kenyan Chips (French Fries)
description: Crispy and fluffy Kenyan-style chips — deep-fried potato sticks loved across the country. Serve with ketchup, vinegar, or as a side to smokie, choma, or eggs.

ingredients.name: Irish potatoes (peeled and cut into sticks)

instructions: Peel and slice potatoes into evenly sized sticks. Soak in cold water for 10–15 minutes (optional for crispier fries).
Pat dry using a clean towel or paper towels.
Heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat.
Fry the chips in batches until golden and crispy (about 6–8 minutes per batch).
Remove and place on paper towels. Season immediately with salt.
Serve hot with ketchup, chili sauce, vinegar, or as a side to smokie or nyama choma.

steps_with_timers.step: Fry chips until golden and crispy
